```jsx
          disabled: true,
        },
        {
          label: 'Not enough notice',
          value: 'not-enough-notice',
          imageSrc: clockImg,
          disabled: true,
        },
        {
          label: "Can't prepare food",
          value: 'cant-prepare-food',
          imageSrc: potImg,
          disabled: true,
        },
      ]}
      value="not-enough-notice"
    />
  );
};
```
